mean_cn: v.伸展，延伸，张开；  n.伸展，张开
mean_en: to make something longer, wider or looser, for example by pulling it; to become longer, etc. in this; (of cloth) to become bigger or longer when you pull it and return to its original shape when you stop; to put your arms or legs out straight and contract your muscles; to put out an arm or a leg in order to reach something;
sentence: The cat is stretching its body.
